findings.title: Elevated Impact of Active Smart Contract Owner Privileges
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Max Transaction %
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change the max transaction %. The smart contract owner can change the value to “zero”. No threshold set.

findings.title: Buy and Sell Taxes
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change the buy and sell taxes. This function module can be used to impose extraordinary transaction fees. No threshold set.

findings.title: Cooldown Timer
findings.description: Functionality to limit the number of transactions that a wallet can make within a 24-hour span.
